# <a name="print-email-and-calendars-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="0077f-102">Štampanje e-pošte i kalendara u Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0077f-102">Print email and calendars in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0077f-103">Da biste odštampali e-poruku:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0077f-103">To print an email message:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="0077f-104">Izaberite poruku koju želite da odštampate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0077f-104">Select the message you want to print.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="0077f-105">U gornjem desnom uglu poruke, izaberite tri tačke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0077f-105">At the top right corner of the message, select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="0077f-106">a zatim izaberite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0077f-106">and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="0077f-107">**Odštampaj**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0077f-107">**Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0077f-108">Da biste odštampali kalendar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0077f-108">To print your calendar:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="0077f-109">U gornjem desnom uglu stranice, izaberite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0077f-109">At the top right corner of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="0077f-110">**Odštampaj**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0077f-110">**Print**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="0077f-111">Odaberite prikaz i vreme opseg i izaberite **Print**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0077f-111">Choose the view and time range, and select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0077f-112">Saznajte više o načinu [štampanja e-pošte i kalendara u Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0077f-112">Learn more about how to [print email and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
